definition[0]: a solid substance made of fat or oil and used to make candles, polish etc
definition[1]: a natural sticky substance in your ears
definition[2]: to rub a layer of wax into a floor, surface etc to protect it or make it shine
definition[3]: when the moon waxes, it seems to get bigger each night
definition[4]: if you wax your legs, arms etc, you remove the hair from them using wax
